author: bnicholes
msg: Switched to xcopy commands in the make file so that we are sure all of the
document directories are copied during the install processing

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add check_socket call to flood_net.h.  This attempts to determine if the
other side has closed on us by doing a poll.  From my observations on
Solaris, it seems that when a FIN is received from the other side,
a POLLIN event is generated.  Odd.  I'd think it should be POLLERR or
POLLHUP, but that doesn't seem to be the case.

author: stoddard
msg: Ensure CACHE_OUT gets installed in front of SUBREQ_CORE on subrequsts.
